Hello! I'm Dmitry Belyaev, Software Engineer. You would probably know me from my blog, courses, or we've met in person.

About me

I am 28 y/o Software Engineer, currently working at Russia's Top IT company. My tech stack includes Golang, Python, Bash, JavaScript and some Java. Apart from programming languages, I am proficient with Linux, Nginx, ELK, Docker, and Kubernetes (currently preparing for certification). Oh, and of course, I use Vim (Neovim).

This site is a Jekyll template Jami Gibbs developed and it's licensed MIT. You're welcome to use it too!
